Property.name: SaveFilePath
Property.HelpText: The save file that will reload when you go back to the main menu. Enter path relative to sadx folder e.g. Save in savedata folder: savedata/knuxsave.snc

Property.name: SaveNum
Property.HelpText: This is the save number in game that will be used, other save files will not be affected but this one. e.g. Choosing number 8 will only replace SonicDX08.snc
